00026 
00027 inline float eigenCross(const Vector2f &v1, const Vector2f &v2)
00028 {
00029   return v1.dot(Vector2f(v2.y(),-v2.x()));
00030 }
00031 
00032 void VectorLocalization2D::LidarParams::initialize()
00033 {
00034   float a0 = -0.5*angleResolution*float(numRays);
00035   scanHeadings.resize(numRays);
00036   int i=0;
00037   for(float a=minAngle; a<maxAngle; a+=angleResolution){
00038     scanHeadings[i] = Vector2f(cos(a),sin(a));
00039     i++;
00040   }
00041 }
00042 
00043 VectorLocalization2D::VectorLocalization2D(const char* _mapsFolder)
00044 {
00045   mapsFolder = string(_mapsFolder);
00046   loadAtlas();
00047   numParticles = 0;
00048   particles.clear();
00049   locCorrectionP0.zero();
00050   locCorrectionP1.zero();
00051 }
00052 
00053 VectorLocalization2D::VectorLocalization2D(int _numParticles)
00054 {
00055   loadAtlas();
00056   numParticles = _numParticles;
00057   particles.resize(_numParticles);
00058   stage0Weights.resize(_numParticles);
00059   stageRWeights.resize(_numParticles);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void VectorLocalization2D::loadAtlas()
00063 {
00064   static const bool debug = true;
00065   string atlasFile = mapsFolder + "/atlas.txt";
00066   FILE* fid = fopen(atlasFile.c_str(),"r");
00067   if(fid==NULL){
00068     TerminalWarning("Unable to load Atlas!");
00069     return;
00070   }
00071   char mapName[4096];
00072   int mapNum;
00073   if(debug) printf("Loading Atlas...\n");
00074   maps.clear();
00075   while(fscanf(fid,"%d %s\n",&mapNum,mapName)==2){
00076     if(debug) printf("Loading map %s\n",mapName);
00077     maps.push_back(VectorMap(mapName,mapsFolder.c_str(),true));
00078   }
00079   if(maps.size()>0)
00080     currentMap = &maps[0];
00081   if(debug) printf("Done Loading Atlas.\n");
00082 }
00083 
00084 Particle2D VectorLocalization2D::createParticle(VectorMap* map, vector2f loc, float angle, float locationUncertainty, float angleUncertainty)
00085 {
00086   return Particle2D(randn(locationUncertainty,loc.x), randn(locationUncertainty,loc.y), randn(angleUncertainty,angle),1.0);
00087 }
00088 
00089 void VectorLocalization2D::setLocation(vector2f loc, float angle, const char* map, float locationUncertainty, float angleUncertainty)
00090 {
00091   for(unsigned int i=0; i<particles.size(); i++){
00092     particles[i].loc = vector2f(randn(locationUncertainty, loc.x), randn(locationUncertainty, loc.y));
00093     particles[i].angle = randn(angleUncertainty, angle);
00094   }
00095 
00096   bool found = false;
00097   int mapIndex=0;
00098   for(unsigned int i=0; !found && i<maps.size(); i++){
00099     if(maps[i].mapName.compare(map)==0){
00100       mapIndex = i;
00101       found = true;
00102     }
00103   }
00104   if(found){
00105     currentMap = &maps[mapIndex];
00106   }else{
00107     char buf[4096];
00108     snprintf(buf, 4095, "Unknown map: \"%s\"",map);
00109     TerminalWarning(buf);
00110   }  
00111 }
00112 
00113 void VectorLocalization2D::setLocation(vector2f loc, float angle, float locationUncertainty, float angleUncertainty)

00115   for(unsigned int i=0; i<particles.size(); i++){
00116     particles[i].loc = vector2f(randn(locationUncertainty, loc.x), randn(locationUncertainty, loc.y));
00117     particles[i].angle = randn(angleUncertainty, angle);
00118   }
00119 }

00121 void VectorLocalization2D::setMap(const char* map)
00122 {
00123   bool found = false;
00124   int mapIndex=0;
00125   for(unsigned int i=0; !found && i<maps.size(); i++){
00126     if(maps[i].mapName.compare(map)==0){
00127       mapIndex = i;
00128       found = true;
00129     }
00130   }
00131   if(found){
00132     currentMap = &maps[mapIndex];
00133   }else{
00134     char buf[4096];
00135     snprintf(buf, 4095, "Unknown map: \"%s\"",map);
00136     TerminalWarning(buf);
00137   }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void VectorLocalization2D::initialize(int _numParticles, const char* mapName, vector2f loc, float angle, float locationUncertainty, float angleUncertainty)
00141 {
00142   static const bool debug = false;
00143   
00144   currentMap = &maps[0];
00145   bool found = false;
00146   for(unsigned int i=0; i<maps.size(); i++){
00147     if(maps[i].mapName.compare(mapName)==0){
00148       found = true;
00149       currentMap = &maps[i];
00150     }
00151   }
00152   if(!found){
00153     char buf[2048];
00154     snprintf(buf,2047,"Map %s not found in Atlas! Reverting to map %s.",mapName,maps[0].mapName.c_str());
00155     TerminalWarning(buf);
00156   }
00157   
00158   numParticles = _numParticles;
00159   particles.resize(numParticles);
00160   stage0Weights.resize(numParticles);
00161   stageRWeights.resize(numParticles);
00162   if(debug) printf(" Initializing particles: 0.0%%\r");
00163   fflush(stdout);
00164   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00165     particles[i] = Particle2D(DBL_MAX,DBL_MAX,0.0,0.0);
00166   }
00167   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00168     if(debug && (i%10)==0){
00169       printf(" Initializing particles: %5.1f%%\r",float(i)/float(numParticles)*100.0);
00170       fflush(stdout);
00171     }
00172     particles[i] = createParticle(currentMap, loc, angle, locationUncertainty, angleUncertainty);
00173   }
00174   
00175   computeLocation(loc, angle);
00176   
00177   laserEval.numCorrespondences = 0;
00178   laserEval.numObservedPoints = 0;
00179   laserEval.runTime = 0;
00180   laserEval.stage0Weights = 0;
00181   laserEval.stageRWeights = 0;
00182   
00183   pointCloudEval.numCorrespondences = 0;
00184   pointCloudEval.numObservedPoints = 0;
00185   pointCloudEval.runTime = 0;
00186   pointCloudEval.stage0Weights = 0;
00187   pointCloudEval.stageRWeights = 0;
00188   
00189   if(debug) printf("\nDone.\n");
00190 }
00191 
00192 void VectorLocalization2D::predict(float dx, float dy, float dtheta, const MotionModelParams &motionParams)
00193 {
00194   lastDistanceMoved += vector2f(dx,dy).rotate(lastAngleTurned);
00195   lastAngleTurned += dtheta;
00196   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00197     predictParticle(particles[i], dx, dy, dtheta, motionParams);
00198   }
00199 }
00200 
00201 float VectorLocalization2D::motionModelWeight(vector2f loc, float angle, const MotionModelParams &motionParams)
00202 {
00203   float sqDensityKernelSize = sq(motionParams.kernelSize);
00204   float w = 0.0;
00205   float incr = 1.0/float(numParticles);
00206   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00207     if( (loc-particles[i].loc).sqlength() < sqDensityKernelSize )
00208       w += incr;
00209   }
00210   return w;
00211 }
00212 
00213 float VectorLocalization2D::observationWeightPointCloud(vector2f loc, float angle, vector< vector2f >& pointCloud, vector< vector2f >& pointNormals, const PointCloudParams & pointCloudParams)
00214 {
00215   //static const bool UseAnalyticRender = false;
00216   static const bool debug = false;
00217   float logOutOfRangeProb = pointCloudParams.logOutOfRangeProb;
00218   float logObstacleProb = pointCloudParams.logObstacleProb;
00219   float logShortHitProb = pointCloudParams.logShortHitProb;
00220   float corelationFactor = pointCloudParams.corelationFactor;
00221   float minRange = pointCloudParams.minRange;
00222   float maxRange = pointCloudParams.maxRange;
00223   float sqMaxRange = sq(maxRange);
00224   float stdDev = pointCloudParams.stdDev;
00225   float curAngle;
00226   
00227   vector<line2f> lines;
00228 
00229   float a0 = angle-0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00230   float a1 = angle+0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00231   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00232     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, minRange, maxRange, true, &lines);
00233   }else{
00234     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, minRange, maxRange);
00235     lines = currentMap->lines;
00236   }
00237   
00238   float logTotalWeight = 0.0;
00239   
00240   Matrix2f rotMat1; 
00241   rotMat1 = Rotation2Df(angle);
00242   
00243   int numCorrespondences = 0;
00244   Vector2f heading, scanPoint, lineNorm, curPoint, attraction, locE(V2COMP(loc)), rotatedNormal;
00245   
00246   for(int i=0; i<pointCloud.size(); i++){
00247     curPoint = rotMat1*Vector2f(V2COMP(pointCloud[i])) + locE;
00248     attraction = Vector2f(0.0,0.0);
00249     if(lineCorrespondences[i]>=0){
00250       numCorrespondences++;
00251       if(UseAnalyticRender){
00252         attraction = observationFunction(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], curPoint);
00253       }else{
00254         attraction = observationFunction(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], curPoint);
00255       }
00256       //logTotalWeight += -attraction.squaredNorm()*corelationFactor/stdDev;
00257       
00258       if(UseAnalyticRender){
00259         lineNorm = Vector2f(V2COMP(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Perp()));
00260       }else{
00261         lineNorm = Vector2f(V2COMP(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Perp()));
00262       }
00263       rotatedNormal = rotMat1*Vector2f(V2COMP(pointNormals[i]));
00264       if(true || fabs(lineNorm.dot(rotatedNormal)) > pointCloudParams.minCosAngleError){
00265         logTotalWeight += -attraction.squaredNorm()*corelationFactor/stdDev;
00266       }else{
00267         logTotalWeight += logObstacleProb*corelationFactor;
00268       }
00269       
00270     }else if( pointCloud[i].sqlength()<sqMaxRange){
00271       logTotalWeight += logObstacleProb*corelationFactor;
00272     }else{
00273       logTotalWeight += logOutOfRangeProb*corelationFactor;
00274     }
00275   }
00276   //return numCorrespondences;
00277   return exp(logTotalWeight);
00278 }
00279 
00280 float VectorLocalization2D::observationWeightLidar(vector2f loc, float angle, const LidarParams &lidarParams, const vector<Vector2f> &laserPoints)
00281 {
00282   static const bool debug = false;
00283   float numRays = lidarParams.numRays;
00284   float minRange = lidarParams.minRange;
00285   float maxRange = lidarParams.maxRange;
00286   float logOutOfRangeProb = lidarParams.logOutOfRangeProb;
00287   float logObstacleProb = lidarParams.logObstacleProb;
00288   float logShortHitProb = lidarParams.logShortHitProb;
00289   
00290   vector2f laserLoc = loc + vector2f(lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans.x(),lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans.y()).rotate(angle);
00291   vector<line2f> lines;
00292   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00293     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, numRays, 0.0, maxRange, true, &lines);
00294   }else{
00295     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, numRays, 0.0, maxRange, false, NULL);
00296   }
00297   
00298   float *scanRays = lidarParams.laserScan;
00299   float curAngle;
00300   Vector2f attraction;
00301   float midScan = float(numRays)/2.0;
00302   
00303   Matrix2f robotAngle;
00304   robotAngle = Rotation2Df(angle);
00305   Vector2f heading, scanPoint, laserLocE(V2COMP(laserLoc));
00306   
00307   float logTotalWeight = 0.0;
00308   
00309   Vector2f scanPoint2, scanDir, lineDir;
00310   Matrix2f robotAngle2;
00311   robotAngle2 = Rotation2Df(angle+lidarParams.angleResolution);
00312   for(int i=0; i<numRays-1; i++){
00313     if(scanRays[i]>maxRange || scanRays[i]<minRange){
00314       logTotalWeight += logObstacleProb*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00315       continue;
00316     }
00317     
00318     if(lineCorrespondences[i]>=0){
00319       scanPoint = laserLocE + robotAngle*laserPoints[i];
00320       scanPoint2 = laserLocE + robotAngle2*laserPoints[i+1];
00321       scanDir = (scanPoint2-scanPoint).normalized();
00322       if(UseAnalyticRender){
00323         lineDir = Vector2f(V2COMP(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Dir()));
00324       }else{
00325         lineDir = Vector2f(V2COMP(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Dir()));
00326       }
00327       if(fabs(lineDir.dot(scanDir))>lidarParams.minCosAngleError){
00328         if(UseAnalyticRender)
00329           attraction = observationFunction(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], scanPoint);
00330         else
00331           attraction = observationFunction(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], scanPoint);
00332         logTotalWeight += -min(attraction.squaredNorm()/lidarParams.lidarStdDev, -logShortHitProb)*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00333       }else{
00334         logTotalWeight += logObstacleProb*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00335       }
00336       
00337     }else if(scanRays[i]<maxRange){
00338       logTotalWeight += logObstacleProb*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00339     }else{
00340       logTotalWeight += logOutOfRangeProb*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00341     }
00342   }
00343   //if(debug) printf("numCorrespondences: %d\n",numCorrespondences);
00344   //exit(-1);
00345   //return numCorrespondences;
00346   return exp(logTotalWeight);
00347 }
00348 
00349 void VectorLocalization2D::computeParticleWeights(vector2f deltaLoc, float deltaAngle, vector2f minLocStdDev, float minAngleStdDev, const MotionModelParams &motionParams)
00350 {
00351   static const bool debug = false;
00352   
00353   int N = particles.size();
00354   vector<vector2f> locMean(2*N);
00355   vector<vector2f> locStdDev(2*N);
00356   vector<float> angleMean(2*N);
00357   vector<float> angleStdDev(2*N);
00358   
00359   currentLocStdDev.x = max(minLocStdDev.x,currentLocStdDev.x);
00360   currentLocStdDev.y = max(minLocStdDev.y,currentLocStdDev.y);
00361   currentAngleStdDev = max(minAngleStdDev,currentAngleStdDev);
00362   
00363   // Compute kernel supports for motion model weights
00364   float deltaTranslation = deltaLoc.length();
00365   
00366   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00367     angleMean[i] = particles[i].angle;
00368     angleStdDev[i] = 1.0/sq( max( float(fabs(deltaAngle))*motionParams.Alpha1 + deltaTranslation*motionParams.Alpha2 , currentAngleStdDev) );
00369     locMean[i] = particles[i].loc;
00370     locStdDev[i].x = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particles[i].angle).x)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.x));
00371     locStdDev[i].y = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particles[i].angle).y)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.y));
00372   }
00373   // Compute motion model weights from kernel supports
00374   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00375     Particle2D &p1 = particles[i];
00376     Particle2D &p2 = particlesRefined[i];
00377     p1.weight = 0.0;
00378     p2.weight = 0.0;
00379     for(int j=0; j<N; j++){
00380       p1.weight += exp(-sq(p1.loc.x - locMean[j].x)*locStdDev[j].x -sq(p1.loc.y - locMean[j].y)*locStdDev[j].y  -sq(angle_diff(p1.angle , angleMean[j]))*angleStdDev[j] );
00381       p2.weight += exp(-sq(p2.loc.x - locMean[j].x)*locStdDev[j].x -sq(p2.loc.y - locMean[j].y)*locStdDev[j].y  -sq(angle_diff(p2.angle , angleMean[j]))*angleStdDev[j] );
00382     }
00383   }
00384   
00385   if(debug){
00386     printf("Motion model weights:\n");
00387     for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00388       printf("%2d unrefined:%20.16f, %20.16f refined:%20.16f, %20.16f\n",i, particles[i].weight,stage0Weights[i], particlesRefined[i].weight,stageRWeights[i]);
00389     }
00390   }
00391   
00392   // Apply observation function weights
00393   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00394     particles[i].weight *= stage0Weights[i];
00395     particlesRefined[i].weight *= stageRWeights[i];
00396   }
00397   
00398   // Compute kernel supports for sampling density function
00399   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00400     angleMean[i] = particles[i].angle;
00401     angleStdDev[i] = 1.0/sq( max( float(fabs(deltaAngle))*motionParams.Alpha1 + deltaTranslation*motionParams.Alpha2 , currentAngleStdDev) );
00402     locMean[i] = particles[i].loc;
00403     locStdDev[i].x = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particles[i].angle).x)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.x));
00404     locStdDev[i].y = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particles[i].angle).y)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.y));
00405     
00406     angleMean[N+i] = particlesRefined[i].angle;
00407     angleStdDev[N+i] = 1.0/sq( max( float(fabs(deltaAngle))*motionParams.Alpha1 + deltaTranslation*motionParams.Alpha2 , currentAngleStdDev) );
00408     locMean[N+i] = particlesRefined[i].loc;
00409     locStdDev[N+i].x = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particlesRefined[i].angle).x)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.x));
00410     locStdDev[N+i].y = 1.0/sq(max( (deltaLoc.rotate(particlesRefined[i].angle).y)*motionParams.Alpha3, currentLocStdDev.y));
00411   }
00412   // Apply sampling density function weights from kernel supports
00413   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00414     Particle2D &p1 = particles[i];
00415     Particle2D &p2 = particlesRefined[i];
00416     float w1 = 0.0;
00417     float w2 = 0.0;
00418     for(int j=0; j<2*N; j++){
00419       w1 += exp(-sq(p1.loc.x - locMean[j].x)*locStdDev[j].x -sq(p1.loc.y - locMean[j].y)*locStdDev[j].y  -sq(angle_diff(p1.angle , angleMean[j]))*angleStdDev[j] );
00420       w2 += exp(-sq(p2.loc.x - locMean[j].x)*locStdDev[j].x -sq(p2.loc.y - locMean[j].y)*locStdDev[j].y  -sq(angle_diff(p2.angle , angleMean[j]))*angleStdDev[j] );
00421     }
00422     p1.weight = p1.weight/w1;
00423     p2.weight = p2.weight/w2;
00424   }
00425   
00426   if(debug){
00427     printf("Final weights:\n");
00428     for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00429       printf("%2d unrefined:%20.16f refined:%20.16f\n",i, particles[i].weight, particlesRefined[i].weight);
00430     }
00431   }
00432 }
00433 
00434 void VectorLocalization2D::updateLidar(const LidarParams &lidarParams, const MotionModelParams & motionParams)
00435 {
00436   static const bool debug = false;
00437   static const bool usePermissibility = true;
00438   
00439   double tStart = GetTimeSec();
00440   
00441   // Transform laserpoints to robot frame
00442   vector< Vector2f > laserPoints(lidarParams.numRays);
00443   for(int i=0; i<lidarParams.numRays; i++){
00444     laserPoints[i] = lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans + lidarParams.laserToBaseRot*lidarParams.scanHeadings[i]*lidarParams.laserScan[i];
00445   }
00446   
00447   //Compute the sampling density
00448   float sqDensityKernelSize = sq(lidarParams.kernelSize);
00449   float totalDensity = 0.0;
00450   int N = int(particlesRefined.size());
00451   if(samplingDensity.size()!=N)
00452     samplingDensity.resize(N);
00453   if(debug) printf("\nParticle samplingDensity:\n");
00454   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00455     float w = 0.99;
00456     for(int j=0; j<N; j++){
00457       if(i==j)
00458         continue;
00459       if( (particlesRefined[j].loc - particlesRefined[i].loc).sqlength() < sqDensityKernelSize && fabs(angle_diff(particlesRefined[j].angle, particlesRefined[i].angle))<RAD(20.0))
00460       //if( (particlesRefined[j].loc - particlesRefined[i].loc).sqlength() < sqDensityKernelSize)
00461         w++;
00462     }
00463     samplingDensity[i] = w;
00464     totalDensity += w;
00465     if(debug) printf("%2d:%f\n",i,w);
00466   }
00467   // Normalize densities, not really necessary since resampling does not require normalized weights
00468   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00469     samplingDensity[i] /= totalDensity;
00470   }
00471   
00472   //Compute importance weights = observation x motion / samplingDensity
00473   if(debug) printf("\nParticle weights:\n");
00474   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00475     Particle2D &p = particlesRefined[i];
00476     float w1 = observationWeightLidar(p.loc, p.angle, lidarParams, laserPoints);
00477     float w2 = motionModelWeight(p.loc, p.angle, motionParams);
00478     p.weight = w1*w2/samplingDensity[i];
00479     if(debug) printf("%2d: %f , %f , %f\n",i,w1,w2,p.weight);
00480   }
00481   
00482   updateTime = GetTimeSec() - tStart;
00483 }
00484 
00485 void VectorLocalization2D::updatePointCloud(vector< vector2f >& pointCloud, vector< vector2f >& pointNormals, const MotionModelParams &motionParams, const PointCloudParams &pointCloudParams)
00486 {
00487   static const bool debug = false;
00488   static const bool usePermissibility = true;
00489   
00490   double tStart = GetTimeSec();
00491   
00492   //Compute the sampling density
00493   float sqDensityKernelSize = sq(pointCloudParams.kernelSize);
00494   float totalDensity = 0.0;
00495   int N = int(particlesRefined.size());
00496   if(samplingDensity.size()!=N)
00497     samplingDensity.resize(N);
00498   if(debug) printf("\nParticle samplingDensity:\n");
00499   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00500     float w = 0.99;
00501     for(int j=0; j<N; j++){
00502       if(i==j)
00503         continue;
00504       if( (particlesRefined[j].loc - particlesRefined[i].loc).sqlength() < sqDensityKernelSize && fabs(angle_diff(particlesRefined[j].angle, particlesRefined[i].angle))<RAD(20.0))
00505         //if( (particlesRefined[j].loc - particlesRefined[i].loc).sqlength() < sqDensityKernelSize)
00506         w++;
00507     }
00508     samplingDensity[i] = w;
00509     totalDensity += w;
00510     if(debug) printf("%2d:%f\n",i,w);
00511   }
00512   // Normalize densities, not really necessary since resampling does not require normalized weights
00513   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00514     samplingDensity[i] /= totalDensity;
00515   }
00516   
00517   //Compute importance weights = observation x motion / samplingDensity
00518   if(debug) printf("\nParticle weights:\n");
00519   for(int i=0; i<N; i++){
00520     Particle2D &p = particlesRefined[i];
00521     float w1 = observationWeightPointCloud(p.loc, p.angle, pointCloud, pointNormals, pointCloudParams);
00522     float w2 = motionModelWeight(p.loc, p.angle, motionParams);
00523     p.weight = w1*w2/samplingDensity[i];
00524     if(debug) printf("%2d: %f , %f , %f\n",i,w1,w2,p.weight);
00525   }
00526   
00527   updateTime = GetTimeSec() - tStart;
00528 }
00529 
00530 void VectorLocalization2D::predictParticle(Particle2D& p, float dx, float dy, float dtheta, const MotionModelParams &motionParams)
00531 {
00532   static const bool debug = false;
00533   
00534   if(debug) printf("predict before: %7.2f,%7.2f %6.2f\u00b0 ",p.loc.x,p.loc.y,DEG(p.angle));
00535   //Motion model
00536   vector2f delta(dx,dy);
00537   float d_trans = delta.length();
00538   
00539   //Predict rotation
00540   dtheta += randn(motionParams.Alpha1*dtheta,0.0f)+randn(motionParams.Alpha2*d_trans,0.0f);
00541   p.angle = angle_mod(p.angle+dtheta);
00542   //Predict translation
00543   if(d_trans>FLT_MIN){
00544     delta = delta.rotate(p.angle);
00545     delta = delta.norm(d_trans + randn(motionParams.Alpha3*d_trans,0.0f));
00546   }
00547   if(debug) printf("delta: %f,%f %f\u00b0 ",V2COMP(delta),DEG(dtheta));
00548   p.loc += delta;
00549   if(debug) printf("after: %7.2f,%7.2f %6.2f\u00b0\n",p.loc.x,p.loc.y,DEG(p.angle));
00550 }
00551 
00552 inline Vector2f VectorLocalization2D::attractorFunction(line2f l, Vector2f p, float attractorRange, float margin)
00553 {
00554   static const bool debug = false;
00555   
00556   Vector2f attraction(0.0,0.0), dir(V2COMP(l.Dir())), p0(V2COMP(l.P0())), p1(V2COMP(l.P1()));
00557   
00558   float location = (p-p0).dot(dir);
00559   
00560   if(location<-margin || location>l.Length()+margin){
00561     return attraction;
00562   }
00563   
00564   attraction = (p-p0) - dir*location ;
00565   
00566   float d = attraction.norm();
00567   /*
00568   if(d>0.5*attractorRange){
00569     float d2 = max(0.0f, attractorRange - d);
00570     attraction *= 2.0f*d2/attractorRange;
00571   }
00572   */
00573   if(d>attractorRange){
00574     attraction = Vector2f::Zero();
00575   }
00576   if(debug){
00577     debugLines.push_back( line2f( vector2f(p.x(),p.y()) ,vector2f((p-attraction).x(),(p-attraction).y()) ) );
00578   }
00579   return attraction;
00580 }
00581 
00582 inline Vector2f VectorLocalization2D::observationFunction(line2f l, Vector2f p)
00583 {
00584   static const bool debug = false;
00585   Vector2f attraction(0.0,0.0), dir(V2COMP(l.Dir())), p0(V2COMP(l.P0())), p1(V2COMP(l.P1()));
00586   float location = (p-p0).dot(dir);
00587   attraction = (p-p0) - dir*location ;
00588   if(debug){
00589     debugLines.push_back( line2f( vector2f(p.x(),p.y()) ,vector2f((p-attraction).x(),(p-attraction).y()) ) );
00590     const float crossSize = 0.002;
00591     debugLines.push_back( line2f( vector2f(p.x()+crossSize,p.y()) , vector2f(p.x()-crossSize,p.y())) );
00592     debugLines.push_back( line2f( vector2f(p.x(),p.y()+crossSize) , vector2f(p.x(),p.y()-crossSize)) );
00593   }
00594   return attraction;
00595 }
00596 
00597 void VectorLocalization2D::getPointCloudGradient(vector2f loc, float angle, vector2f& locGrad, float& angleGrad, const std::vector< vector2f >& pointCloud, const std::vector< vector2f >& pointNormals, float& logWeight, const VectorLocalization2D::PointCloudParams& pointCloudParams, const vector<int> & lineCorrespondences, const vector<line2f> &lines)
00598 {
00599   //static const bool UseAnalyticRender = false;
00600   static const bool debug = false;
00601   FunctionTimer *ft;
00602   if(EnableProfiling)
00603     ft = new FunctionTimer(__FUNCTION__);
00604   
00605   float numTotalPoints = pointCloud.size();
00606   
00607   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00608   //vector<int> lineCorrespondences;
00609   //vector<line2f> lines;
00610   
00611   /*
00612   float minRange = pointCloudParams.minRange;
00613   float maxRange = pointCloudParams.maxRange;
00614   float a0 = angle-0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00615   float a1 = angle+0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00616   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00617     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, minRange, maxRange, true, &lines);
00618   }else{
00619     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, minRange, maxRange);
00620     lines = currentMap->lines;
00621   }
00622   */
00623   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00624   
00625   float numPoints = 0;
00626   
00627   float cosAngle;
00628   int noCorrespondences = 0;
00629   logWeight = 0.0;
00630   
00631   int numObservedPoints = int(pointCloud.size());
00632   pointCloudEval.numObservedPoints = numObservedPoints;
00633   
00634   //Construct gradients per point in point cloud
00635   gradients2.resize(numObservedPoints);
00636   points2.resize(numObservedPoints);
00637   int numPointsInt = 0;
00638   
00639   Vector2f curPoint, locE(V2COMP(loc)), attraction, lineNorm, rotatedNormal;
00640   Matrix2f rotMat1;
00641   rotMat1 = Rotation2Df(angle);
00642   
00643   for(int i=0; i<numObservedPoints; i++){
00644     curPoint = rotMat1*Vector2f(V2COMP(pointCloud[i])) + locE;
00645     rotatedNormal = rotMat1*Vector2f(V2COMP(pointNormals[i]));
00646     attraction = Vector2f(0,0);
00647     
00648     if(lineCorrespondences[i]>=0 && lineCorrespondences[i]<lines.size()){
00649       lineNorm = Vector2f(V2COMP(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Perp()));
00650       cosAngle = fabs(lineNorm.dot(rotatedNormal));
00651       
00652       //Attraction only for valid correspondences
00653       if(cosAngle > pointCloudParams.minCosAngleError){
00654         attraction = attractorFunction(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], curPoint,pointCloudParams.attractorRange, pointCloudParams.correspondenceMargin);
00655         //Add the point and attraction (only if non-zero)
00656         //logWeight += -min(attraction.squaredNorm()/pointCloudParams.stdDev, -pointCloudParams.logShortHitProb)*pointCloudParams.corelationFactor;
00657         
00658         gradients2[numPointsInt] = attraction;
00659         points2[numPointsInt] = curPoint;
00660         numPointsInt++;
00661       }
00662     }else{
00663       noCorrespondences++;
00664     }
00665   }
00666   points2.resize(numPointsInt);
00667   gradients2.resize(numPointsInt);
00668   numPoints = float(numPointsInt);
00669   pointCloudEval.numCorrespondences = int(points2.size());
00670   
00671   if(debug) printf("No correspondences: %d/%d \n",noCorrespondences,int(pointCloud.size()));
00672   
00673   if(numPoints<pointCloudParams.minPoints){
00674     locGrad.zero();
00675     angleGrad = 0.0;
00676     return;
00677   }
00678   
00679   //Estimate translation and rotation
00680   Vector2f locGradE(0,0);
00681   Vector2f heading(0,0), curHeading, r;
00682   float headingAngle;
00683   pointCloudEval.meanSqError = 0.0;
00684   for(int i = 0; i<numPointsInt; i++){
00685     r = points2[i] - locE;
00686     pointCloudEval.meanSqError += gradients2[i].squaredNorm();
00687     if(r.squaredNorm()<sq(0.001))
00688       continue;
00689     
00690     locGradE += gradients2[i];
00691     headingAngle = eigenCross(r,gradients2[i]);
00692     curHeading = Vector2f(cos(headingAngle),sin(headingAngle));
00693     heading += curHeading;
00694   }
00695   locGradE = locGradE/numPoints;
00696   locGrad.set(locGradE.x(),locGradE.y());
00697   heading = heading/numPoints;
00698   pointCloudEval.meanSqError = pointCloudEval.meanSqError/numPoints;
00699   
00700   angleGrad = bound(atan2(heading.y(),heading.x()),-pointCloudParams.maxAngleGradient,pointCloudParams.maxAngleGradient);
00701   
00702   locGrad = locGrad.bound(pointCloudParams.maxLocGradient);
00703   if(debug) printf("LocGrad: %6.2f %6.2f AngleGrad:%6.1f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(locGrad), DEG(angleGrad));
00704     
00705   if(EnableProfiling) delete ft;
00706 }
00707 
00708 void VectorLocalization2D::getLidarGradient(vector2f loc, float angle, vector2f& locGrad, float& angleGrad, float& logWeight, VectorLocalization2D::LidarParams lidarParams, const vector<Vector2f>& laserPoints, const vector<int> & lineCorrespondences, const vector<line2f> &lines)
00709 {
00710   static const bool EnableProfiling = false;
00711   
00712   FunctionTimer *ft;
00713   if(EnableProfiling)
00714     ft = new FunctionTimer(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00715   
00716   float logShortHitProb = lidarParams.logShortHitProb;
00717   Matrix2f robotAngle;
00718   robotAngle = Rotation2Df(angle);
00719   Vector2f laserLocE = Vector2f(V2COMP(loc)) + robotAngle*(lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans);
00720   vector2f laserLoc(laserLocE.x(), laserLocE.y());
00721   
00722   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00723   
00724   /*
00725   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00726     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, lidarParams.numRays, lidarParams.minRange, lidarParams.maxRange, true, &lines);
00727   }else{
00728     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, lidarParams.numRays, lidarParams.minRange, lidarParams.maxRange);
00729   }
00730   */
00731   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00732   
00733   points.clear();
00734   gradients.clear();
00735   static const bool debug = false;
00736   float *scanRays = lidarParams.laserScan;
00737   float minRange = lidarParams.minRange;
00738   float maxRange = lidarParams.maxRange;
00739   float curAngle;
00740   Vector2f heading, heading2;
00741   float numPoints = 0;
00742   float midScan = float(lidarParams.numRays)/2.0;
00743   float cosAngle;
00744   int noCorrespondences = 0;
00745   logWeight = 0.0;
00746   curAngle = angle - midScan*lidarParams.angleResolution;
00747   //Construct gradients per point in point cloud
00748   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00749   
00750   Matrix2f robotAngle2;
00751   robotAngle2 = Rotation2Df(angle+lidarParams.angleResolution);
00752   Vector2f scanPoint, scanPoint2, scanDir, lineDir, attraction;
00753   
00754   //TODO: Speed up this section!!
00755   //===========================================================================
00756   laserEval.numObservedPoints = 0;
00757   for(int i=0; i<lidarParams.numRays-1; i++, curAngle+=lidarParams.angleResolution){
00758     if(scanRays[i]<minRange || scanRays[i]>maxRange)
00759       continue;
00760     laserEval.numObservedPoints++;  
00761     scanPoint = laserLocE + robotAngle*laserPoints[i];
00762     
00763     if(lineCorrespondences[i]>=0){
00764       scanPoint2 = laserLocE + robotAngle2*laserPoints[i+1];
00765       scanDir = (scanPoint2-scanPoint).normalized();
00766       if(UseAnalyticRender){
00767         lineDir = Vector2f(V2COMP(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Dir()));
00768         attraction = attractorFunction(lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], scanPoint, lidarParams.attractorRange, lidarParams.correspondenceMargin);
00769       }else{
00770         lineDir = Vector2f(V2COMP(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]].Dir()));
00771         attraction = attractorFunction(currentMap->lines[lineCorrespondences[i]], scanPoint, lidarParams.attractorRange, lidarParams.correspondenceMargin);
00772       }
00773       logWeight += -min(attraction.squaredNorm()/lidarParams.lidarStdDev, -logShortHitProb)*lidarParams.correlationFactor;
00774       cosAngle = fabs(lineDir.dot(scanDir));
00775       if(cosAngle>lidarParams.minCosAngleError){
00776         gradients.push_back(attraction);
00777         points.push_back(scanPoint);
00778       }
00779     }else{
00780       noCorrespondences++;
00781     }
00782     
00783   }  
00784   numPoints = float(points.size());
00785   laserEval.numCorrespondences = int(points.size());
00786   
00787   //if(debug) printf("No correspondences: %d/%d numPoints:%d\n",noCorrespondences,lidarParams.numRays,int(numPoints));
00788   //===========================================================================
00789   
00790   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00791   
00792   if(numPoints<lidarParams.minPoints){
00793     locGrad.zero();
00794     angleGrad = 0.0;
00795     if(EnableProfiling) delete ft;
00796     return;
00797   }
00798   
00799   //Estimate translation and rotation
00800   locGrad.zero();
00801   heading = Vector2f(0,0);
00802   float headingAngle;
00803   laserEval.meanSqError = 0.0;
00804   Vector2f locE(V2COMP(loc)), r, locGradE(0.0,0.0);
00805   for(int i = 0; i<gradients.size(); i++){
00806     r = points[i]-locE;
00807     laserEval.meanSqError += gradients[i].squaredNorm();
00808     if(r.squaredNorm()<sq(0.03))
00809       continue;
00810     locGradE += gradients[i];
00811     headingAngle = eigenCross(r, gradients[i]);
00812     heading += Vector2f(cos(headingAngle),sin(headingAngle));
00813   }
00814   locGradE /= numPoints;
00815   locGrad.set(locGradE.x(),locGradE.y());
00816   heading /= numPoints;
00817   laserEval.meanSqError /= numPoints;
00818   
00819   if(EnableProfiling) ft->Lap(__LINE__);
00820     
00821   locGrad = locGrad.bound(lidarParams.maxLocGradient);
00822   angleGrad = bound(atan2(heading.y(),heading.x()),-lidarParams.maxAngleGradient,lidarParams.maxAngleGradient);
00823   if(EnableProfiling) delete ft;
00824   if(debug) printf("Gradient: %.4f,%.4f %.2f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(locGrad),DEG(angleGrad));
00825 }
00826 
00827 void VectorLocalization2D::refineLocationLidar(vector2f& loc, float& angle, float& initialWeight, float& finalWeight, const LidarParams &lidarParams, const vector<Vector2f> &laserPoints)
00828 {
00829   static const bool debug = false;
00830   
00831   //Do gradient descent for this particle
00832   vector2f locGrad(0.0,0.0);
00833   float angleGrad = 0.0;
00834   bool beingRefined = true;
00835   float weight;
00836   
00837   if(debug) printf("before: %.4f,%.4f %.2f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc),DEG(angle));
00838   
00839   Matrix2f robotAngle;
00840   robotAngle = Rotation2Df(angle);  
00841   Vector2f laserLocE = Vector2f(V2COMP(loc)) + robotAngle*(lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans);
00842   vector2f laserLoc(laserLocE.x(), laserLocE.y());
00843   vector<line2f> lines;
00844   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00845     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, lidarParams.numRays, lidarParams.minRange, lidarParams.maxRange, true, &lines);
00846   }else{
00847     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(laserLoc, angle, lidarParams.angleResolution, lidarParams.numRays, lidarParams.minRange, lidarParams.maxRange);
00848   }
00849   
00850   for(int i=0; beingRefined && i<lidarParams.numSteps; i++){
00851     getLidarGradient(loc,angle,locGrad,angleGrad,weight,lidarParams, laserPoints, lineCorrespondences, lines);
00852     if(i==0) initialWeight = exp(weight);
00853     loc -= lidarParams.etaLoc*locGrad;
00854     angle -= lidarParams.etaAngle*angleGrad;
00855     beingRefined = fabs(angleGrad)>lidarParams.minRefineFraction*lidarParams.maxAngleGradient && locGrad.sqlength()>sq(lidarParams.minRefineFraction*lidarParams.maxLocGradient);
00856   }
00857   
00858   if(debug) printf("after: %.4f,%.4f %.2f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc),DEG(angle));
00859   finalWeight = exp(weight);
00860 }
00861 
00862 void VectorLocalization2D::refineLocationPointCloud(vector2f& loc, float& angle, float& initialWeight, float& finalWeight, const std::vector< vector2f >& pointCloud, const std::vector< vector2f >& pointNormals, const VectorLocalization2D::PointCloudParams& pointCloudParams)
00863 {
00864   static const bool debug = false;
00865   //FunctionTimer ft(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00866   
00867   //Do gradient descent for this particle
00868   vector2f locGrad(0.0,0.0);
00869   float angleGrad = 0.0;
00870   bool beingRefined = true;
00871   
00872   
00873   float a0 = angle-0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00874   float a1 = angle+0.5*pointCloudParams.fieldOfView;
00875   vector<line2f> lines;
00876   if(UseAnalyticRender){
00877     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, pointCloudParams.minRange, pointCloudParams.maxRange, true, &lines);
00878   }else{
00879     lineCorrespondences = currentMap->getRayToLineCorrespondences(loc, angle, a0, a1, pointCloud, pointCloudParams.minRange, pointCloudParams.maxRange);
00880     lines = currentMap->lines;
00881   }
00882   
00883   vector2f locPrev = loc;
00884   float anglePrev = angle;
00885   float weight;
00886   locCorrectionP0 = loc;
00887   for(int i=0; beingRefined && i<pointCloudParams.numSteps; i++){
00888     getPointCloudGradient(loc,angle,locGrad,angleGrad,pointCloud,pointNormals,weight, pointCloudParams, lineCorrespondences, lines);
00889     if(i==0) initialWeight = exp(weight);
00890     loc -= pointCloudParams.etaLoc*locGrad;
00891     angle -= pointCloudParams.etaAngle*angleGrad;
00892     beingRefined = fabs(angleGrad)>pointCloudParams.minRefineFraction*pointCloudParams.maxAngleGradient && locGrad.sqlength()>sq(pointCloudParams.minRefineFraction*pointCloudParams.maxLocGradient);
00893   }
00894   locCorrectionP1 = loc;
00895   finalWeight = exp(weight);
00896   if(debug) printf("gradient: %7.3f,%7.3f %6.1f\u00b0\n",V2COMP(loc-locPrev),DEG(angle-anglePrev));
00897 }
00898 
00899 void VectorLocalization2D::refineLidar(const LidarParams &lidarParams)
00900 {
00901   //FunctionTimer ft(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00902   double tStart = GetTimeSec();
00903   laserEval.stage0Weights = 0.0;
00904   laserEval.stageRWeights = 0.0;
00905   laserEval.lastRunTime = GetTimeSec();
00906   
00907   // Transform laserpoints to robot frame
00908   vector< Vector2f > laserPoints(lidarParams.numRays);
00909   for(int i=0; i<lidarParams.numRays; i++){
00910     laserPoints[i] = lidarParams.laserToBaseTrans + lidarParams.laserToBaseRot*lidarParams.scanHeadings[i]*lidarParams.laserScan[i];
00911   }
00912   
00913   particlesRefined = particles;
00914   if(lidarParams.numSteps>0){
00915     for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00916       refineLocationLidar(particlesRefined[i].loc, particlesRefined[i].angle, stage0Weights[i], stageRWeights[i], lidarParams, laserPoints);
00917       laserEval.stage0Weights += stage0Weights[i];
00918       laserEval.stageRWeights += stageRWeights[i];
00919     }
00920   }
00921   refineTime = GetTimeSec() - tStart;
00922   laserEval.runTime = refineTime;
00923 }
00924 
00925 
00926 void VectorLocalization2D::reducePointCloud(const std::vector< vector2f >& pointCloud, const std::vector< vector2f >& pointNormals, vector< vector2f >& reducedPointCloud, vector< vector2f >& reducedPointNormals)
00927 {
00928   static const bool debug = false;
00929   static const float eps = -RAD(0.001);
00930   
00931   vector<pair<float, int> > angles;
00932   size_t N = pointCloud.size();
00933   pair<float,int> valuePair;
00934   
00935   for(unsigned int i=0; i<N; i++){
00936     valuePair.first = pointCloud[i].angle();
00937     valuePair.second = i;
00938     angles.push_back(valuePair);
00939   }
00940   //N = min(angles.size(),N);
00941   sort<vector<pair<float, int> >::iterator >(angles.begin(), angles.end());
00942   
00943   
00944   reducedPointCloud.resize(N);
00945   reducedPointNormals.resize(N);
00946   int j=0;
00947   float lastAngle;
00948   for(unsigned int i=0; i<N; ){
00949     reducedPointCloud[j] = pointCloud[angles[i].second];
00950     reducedPointNormals[j] = pointNormals[angles[i].second];
00951     j++;
00952     lastAngle = angles[i].first;
00953     
00954     for(i++;i<N && angles[i].first<=lastAngle+eps;){
00955       i++;
00956     }
00957   }
00958   N = j;
00959   reducedPointCloud.resize(N);
00960   reducedPointNormals.resize(N);
00961   
00962   
00963   if(debug){
00964     printf("\n");
00965     for(unsigned int i=0; i<N; i++){
00966       //printf("%4d: %6.2f\u00b0 %4d\n",int(i),DEG((*it).first),(*it).second);
00967       printf("%4d: %6.2f\u00b0\n",int(i),DEG(angles[i].first));
00968     }
00969   }
00970 }
00971 
00972 void VectorLocalization2D::refinePointCloud(const vector<vector2f> &pointCloud, const vector<vector2f> &pointNormals, const PointCloudParams &pointCloudParams)
00973 {
00974   //FunctionTimer ft(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00975   double tStart = GetTimeSec();
00976   pointCloudEval.stage0Weights = 0.0;
00977   pointCloudEval.stageRWeights = 0.0;
00978   pointCloudEval.lastRunTime = GetTimeSec();
00979   
00980   /*
00981   vector< vector2f > reducedPointCloud, reducedPointNormals;
00982   reducePointCloud(pointCloud, pointNormals, reducedPointCloud, reducedPointNormals);
00983   */
00984   
00985   particlesRefined = particles;
00986   if(pointCloudParams.numSteps>0){
00987     for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
00988       //refineLocationPointCloud(particlesRefined[i].loc, particlesRefined[i].angle, stage0Weights[i], stageRWeights[i],reducedPointCloud, reducedPointNormals, pointCloudParams);
00989       refineLocationPointCloud(particlesRefined[i].loc, particlesRefined[i].angle, stage0Weights[i], stageRWeights[i],pointCloud, pointNormals, pointCloudParams);
00990       pointCloudEval.stage0Weights += stage0Weights[i];
00991       pointCloudEval.stageRWeights += stageRWeights[i];
00992     }
00993   }
00994   refineTime = GetTimeSec() - tStart;
00995   pointCloudEval.runTime = refineTime;
00996 }
00997 
00998 void VectorLocalization2D::computeLocation(vector2f& loc, float& angle)
00999 {
01000   vector2f heading;
01001   vector2f avgHeading;
01002   currentLocation.zero();
01003   avgHeading.zero();
01004   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
01005     currentLocation = currentLocation + particles[i].loc;
01006     heading.heading(particles[i].angle);
01007     avgHeading = avgHeading + heading;
01008   }
01009   currentAngle = avgHeading.angle();
01010   currentLocation = currentLocation/float(numParticles);
01011   
01012   currentLocStdDev.zero();
01013   currentAngleStdDev = 0.0;
01014   float xStdDev=0.0, yStdDev=0.0;
01015   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
01016     /*
01017     xStdDev += sq(float(particles[i].loc.x-currentLocation.x));
01018     yStdDev += sq(float(particles[i].loc.y-currentLocation.y));
01019     currentAngleStdDev += sq(float(angle_diff(particles[i].angle,currentAngle)));
01020     */
01021     xStdDev = max(xStdDev, float(fabs(particles[i].loc.x-currentLocation.x)));
01022     yStdDev = max(yStdDev, float(fabs(particles[i].loc.y-currentLocation.y)));
01023     currentAngleStdDev = max(currentAngleStdDev, float(fabs(angle_diff(particles[i].angle,currentAngle))));
01024   }
01025   /*
01026   currentAngleStdDev = sqrt(currentAngleStdDev/float(numParticles-1.0));
01027   xStdDev = sqrt(xStdDev/float(numParticles));
01028   yStdDev = sqrt(yStdDev/float(numParticles));
01029   */
01030   currentLocStdDev.set(xStdDev,yStdDev);
01031   loc = currentLocation;
01032   angle = currentAngle;
01033 }
01034 
01035 void VectorLocalization2D::resample(Resample type)
01036 {
01037   switch(type){
01038     case NaiveResampling:{
01039       naiveResample();
01040     }break;
01041     case LowVarianceResampling:{
01042       lowVarianceResample();
01043     }break;
01044     case SensorResettingResampling:{
01045     }break;
01046   }
01047 }
01048 
01049 void VectorLocalization2D::lowVarianceResample()
01050 { 
01051   vector<Particle2D> newParticles;
01052   newParticles.resize(numParticles);
01053   float totalWeight = 0.0;
01054   float newWeight = 1.0/float(numParticles);
01055   int numRefinedParticles = (int) particlesRefined.size();
01056   
01057   refinedImportanceWeights = unrefinedImportanceWeights = 0.0;
01058   for(int i=0; i<numRefinedParticles; i++){
01059     //Get rid of particles with undefined weights
01060     if(isnan(particlesRefined[i].weight) || isinf(particlesRefined[i].weight) || particlesRefined[i].weight<0.0)
01061       particlesRefined[i].weight = 0.0;
01062     totalWeight += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01063     if(i<numParticles)
01064       refinedImportanceWeights += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01065     else
01066       unrefinedImportanceWeights += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01067   }
01068   
01069   if(totalWeight<FLT_MIN){
01070     //TerminalWarning("Particles have zero total weight!");
01071     for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
01072       particles[i].weight = newWeight;
01073     }
01074     return;
01075     //exit(0);
01076   }
01077   
01078   float weightIncrement = totalWeight/float(numParticles);
01079   if(weightIncrement<FLT_MIN) TerminalWarning("Particle weights less than float precision");
01080   
01081   numRefinedParticlesSampled = numUnrefinedParticlesSampled = 0;
01082   float x = frand(0.0f,totalWeight);
01083   int j=0;
01084   float f=particlesRefined[0].weight;
01085   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
01086     while(f<x){
01087       j = (j+1)%numRefinedParticles;
01088       f += particlesRefined[j].weight;
01089     }
01090     if(j<numParticles)
01091       numRefinedParticlesSampled++;
01092     else
01093       numUnrefinedParticlesSampled++;
01094     
01095     newParticles[i] = particlesRefined[j];
01096     newParticles[i].weight = newWeight;
01097     if(particlesRefined[i].weight < FLT_MIN){
01098       //This particle was depleted: add replacement noise
01099       vector2f deltaLoc = vector2f(frand(-1.0,1.0),frand(-1.0,1.0))*0.05;
01100       float deltaAngle = frand(-1.0,1.0)*RAD(5.0);
01101       newParticles[i].loc += deltaLoc;
01102       newParticles[i].lastLoc += deltaLoc;
01103       newParticles[i].angle += deltaAngle;
01104     }
01105     x += weightIncrement;
01106   }
01107   
01108   particles = newParticles;
01109 }
01110 
01111 void VectorLocalization2D::naiveResample()
01112 {
01113   vector<Particle2D> newParticles;
01114   static vector<Particle2D> oldParticles;
01115   newParticles.resize(numParticles);
01116   float totalWeight = 0.0;
01117   float newWeight = 1.0/numParticles;
01118   int numRefinedParticles = (int) particlesRefined.size();
01119   
01120   refinedImportanceWeights = unrefinedImportanceWeights = 0.0;
01121   int numInfs=0, numNans=0, numNegs=0;
01122   for(int i=0; i<numRefinedParticles; i++){
01123     if(isnan(particlesRefined[i].weight))
01124       numNans++;
01125     else if(isinf(particlesRefined[i].weight))
01126       numInfs++;
01127     else if(particlesRefined[i].weight<0.0)
01128       numNegs++;
01129     //Get rid of particles with undefined weights
01130     if(isnan(particlesRefined[i].weight) || isinf(particlesRefined[i].weight) || particlesRefined[i].weight<0.0)
01131       particlesRefined[i].weight = 0.0;
01132     totalWeight += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01133     if(i<numParticles)
01134       refinedImportanceWeights += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01135     else
01136       unrefinedImportanceWeights += particlesRefined[i].weight;
01137   }
01138   if(totalWeight<FLT_MIN){
01139     TerminalWarning("Particles have zero total weight!");
01140     printf("inf:%d nan:%d neg:%d\n",numInfs, numNans, numNegs);
01141     particles = oldParticles;
01142     return;
01143     //exit(0);
01144   }
01145   
01146   numRefinedParticlesSampled = numUnrefinedParticlesSampled = 0;
01147   for(int i=0; i<numParticles; i++){
01148     float x = frand(0.0f,totalWeight);
01149     float f=particlesRefined[0].weight;
01150     int j=0;
01151     while(f<x && j<numRefinedParticles-1){
01152       j++;
01153       f += particlesRefined[j].weight;
01154     }
01155     if(j<numParticles)
01156       numRefinedParticlesSampled++;
01157     else
01158       numUnrefinedParticlesSampled++;
01159     newParticles[i] = particlesRefined[j];
01160     newParticles[i].weight = newWeight;
01161   }
01162   particles = newParticles;
01163   oldParticles = particles;
01164 }
01165 
01166 void VectorLocalization2D::drawDisplay(vector<float> &lines_p1x, vector<float> &lines_p1y, vector<float> &lines_p2x, vector<float> &lines_p2y, vector<uint32_t> &lines_color,
01167                                      vector<float> &points_x, vector<float> &points_y, vector<uint32_t> &points_color, 
01168                                        vector<float> &circles_x, vector<float> &circles_y, vector<uint32_t> &circles_color, float scale)
01169 {
01170   static const bool debug = false;
01171   static const bool drawParticles = true;
01172   static const bool drawLidarPoints = true;
01173   static const bool drawKinectPoints = true;
01174   static const bool drawCorrections = true;
01175   static const bool drawSceneRender = false;
01176   
01177   static const float GradientsScale = 1.0;
01178   static const int ParticleCloudColor = 0xF77274;
01179   static const int LidarPointColor = 0xF0761F;
01180   static const int LidarGradientColor = 0x2F95ED;
01181   static const int CloudPointColor = 0xDE2352;
01182   static const int CloudGradientColor = 0x8A23DE;
01183   static const int LineCorrespondenceColor = 0x93FA70;
01184   static const int LineExtentColor = 0xFFD659;
01185   static const int DebugColour = 0xFF0000;
01186   
01187   for(int i=0; i<debugLines.size(); i++){
01188     lines_p1x.push_back(scale*debugLines[i].P0().x);
01189     lines_p1y.push_back(scale*debugLines[i].P0().y);
01190     lines_p2x.push_back(scale*debugLines[i].P1().x);
01191     lines_p2y.push_back(scale*debugLines[i].P1().y);
01192     lines_color.push_back(DebugColour);
01193   }
01194   debugLines.clear();
01195   
01196   if(drawCorrections){
01197     vector2f p2 = locCorrectionP1 + 20.0*(locCorrectionP1 - locCorrectionP0);
01198     lines_p1x.push_back(scale*locCorrectionP0.x);
01199     lines_p1y.push_back(scale*locCorrectionP0.y);
01200     lines_p2x.push_back(scale*p2.x);
01201     lines_p2y.push_back(scale*p2.y);
01202     lines_color.push_back(0x1BE042);
01203   }
01204   
01205   if(drawParticles){
01206     //Draw all (unrefined) particles
01207     for(int i=0; i<particles.size(); i++){
01208       circles_x.push_back(scale*particles[i].loc.x);
01209       circles_y.push_back(scale*particles[i].loc.y);
01210       circles_color.push_back(ParticleCloudColor);
01211       
01212       vector2f h;
01213       h.heading(particles[i].angle);
01214       vector2f p = particles[i].loc + 0.3*h;
01215       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*particles[i].loc.x);
01216       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*particles[i].loc.y);
01217       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*p.x);
01218       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*p.y);
01219       lines_color.push_back(ParticleCloudColor);
01220     }
01221   }
01222   
01223   if(drawSceneRender){
01224     vector2f loc;
01225     float angle;
01226     computeLocation(loc,angle);
01227     vector<line2f> lines = currentMap->sceneRender(loc,0.0,RAD(359.9));
01228     vector<int> locVisibilityList;
01229     if(currentMap->preRenderExists)
01230       locVisibilityList = *currentMap->getVisibilityList(loc.x, loc.y);
01231     else
01232       locVisibilityList = currentMap->getSceneLines(loc, 6.5);
01233     
01234     for(unsigned int i=0; i<locVisibilityList.size(); i++){
01235       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*currentMap->lines[locVisibilityList[i]].P0().x);
01236       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*currentMap->lines[locVisibilityList[i]].P0().y);
01237       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*currentMap->lines[locVisibilityList[i]].P1().x);
01238       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*currentMap->lines[locVisibilityList[i]].P1().y);
01239       lines_color.push_back(0x00DE07);
01240     }
01241     
01242     vector<vector2f> rays;
01243     vector2f ray;
01244     bool duplicate;
01245     for(unsigned int i=0; i<lines.size(); i++){
01246       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*lines[i].P0().x);
01247       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*lines[i].P0().y);
01248       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*lines[i].P1().x);
01249       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*lines[i].P1().y);
01250       lines_color.push_back(DebugColour);
01251       
01252       duplicate = false;
01253       ray = lines[i].P0()-loc;
01254       for(int j=0; j<rays.size()&&!duplicate; j++){
01255         if(ray.norm().dot(rays[j].norm())>cos(RAD(0.1)) && fabs(ray.length()-rays[j].length())<0.01){
01256           duplicate = true;
01257           j = rays.erase(rays.begin()+j) - rays.begin();
01258         }
01259       }
01260       if(!duplicate)
01261         rays.push_back(ray);
01262       
01263       duplicate = false;
01264       ray = lines[i].P1()-loc;
01265       for(int j=0; j<rays.size()&&!duplicate; j++){
01266         if(ray.norm().dot(rays[j].norm())>cos(RAD(0.1)) && fabs(ray.length()-rays[j].length())<0.01){
01267           duplicate = true;
01268           j = rays.erase(rays.begin()+j) - rays.begin();
01269         }
01270       }
01271       if(!duplicate)
01272         rays.push_back(ray);
01273     }
01274     
01275     for(int i=0; i<rays.size(); i++){
01276       vector2f p0 = loc;
01277       vector2f p1 = rays[i]+loc;
01278       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*p0.x);
01279       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*p0.y);
01280       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*p1.x);
01281       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*p1.y);
01282       lines_color.push_back(LineExtentColor);
01283     }
01284     
01285   }
01286   
01287   if(drawLidarPoints){
01288     // Draw all LIDAR points considered for gradient descent, as well as their gradients
01289     for(int i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
01290       points_x.push_back(scale*points[i].x());
01291       points_y.push_back(scale*points[i].y());
01292       points_color.push_back(LidarPointColor);
01293       Vector2f p = points[i] - GradientsScale*gradients[i];
01294       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*points[i].x());
01295       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*points[i].y());
01296       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*p.x());
01297       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*p.y());
01298       lines_color.push_back(LidarGradientColor);
01299     }
01300   }
01301   
01302   if(drawKinectPoints){
01303     // Draw all point cloud points considered for gradient descent, as well as their gradients
01304     for(int i=0; i<points2.size(); i++){
01305       points_x.push_back(scale*points2[i].x());
01306       points_y.push_back(scale*points2[i].y());
01307       points_color.push_back(CloudPointColor);
01308       Vector2f p = points2[i] - GradientsScale*gradients2[i];
01309       lines_p1x.push_back(scale*points2[i].x());
01310       lines_p1y.push_back(scale*points2[i].y());
01311       lines_p2x.push_back(scale*p.x());
01312       lines_p2y.push_back(scale*p.y());
01313       lines_color.push_back(CloudGradientColor);
01314     }
01315   }
01316   
01317 }

01319 void VectorLocalization2D::saveProfilingStats(FILE* f)

01324 void VectorLocalization2D::saveRunLog(FILE* f)
01325 {
01326   static const bool saveParticles = false;
01327   fprintf(f, "%d, %d, %.15f, %.15f, ",numRefinedParticlesSampled, numUnrefinedParticlesSampled, refinedImportanceWeights, unrefinedImportanceWeights);
01328   if(saveParticles){
01329     for(int i=0; i<particles.size(); i++){
01330       fprintf(f, "%.3f, %.3f, %.2f, %f, ",V2COMP(particles[i].loc), DEG(particles[i].angle), particles[i].weight);
01331     }
01332   }
01333 }

01335 void VectorLocalization2D::getEvalValues(VectorLocalization2D::EvalValues& _laserEval, VectorLocalization2D::EvalValues& _pointCloudEval)
01336 {
01337   laserEval.stage0Weights /= float(numParticles);
01338   laserEval.stageRWeights /= float(numParticles);
01339   pointCloudEval.stage0Weights /= float(numParticles);
01340   pointCloudEval.stageRWeights /= float(numParticles);
01341   _laserEval = laserEval;
01342   _pointCloudEval = pointCloudEval;
01343 }

01345 void VectorLocalization2D::getUncertainty(float& _angleUnc, float& _locUnc)
01346 {
01347   _angleUnc = currentAngleStdDev;
01348   _locUnc = currentLocStdDev.length();
01349 }
